dmca.title: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

-----Original Message-----
From: abuseadm@theplanet.com [mailto:abuseadm@theplanet.com] On Behalf Of Policy
Enforcement
Posted At: Friday, June 16, 2006 7:07 AM
Posted To: Copyright
Conversation: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]
Subject: [Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation]


For your review.

Thank you,

Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

-------- Original Message --------
Subject: [ABUSE] copyright violation
Date: Fri, 16 Jun 2006 03:41:08 -0400
From: Ron Williams <ron@ronsnexus.com>
To: <abuse@theplanet.com>

Hello,
I have tried resolving the issue with the violator Antony Shen regarding use of my
content illegally, however this has failed and has caused me as my last resort
before taking legal action, to contact his host to have the content removed.

Below is an e-mail that was sent to Antony Shen on 6/12/06, 6/13/06, and 6/14/06.

Attention Antony Shen and/or owner of the domain name sillydog.org.

This letter serves as a notification for cease and desist under the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act, 17 U.S.C.
